MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Ferry Road Avenue. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 09:45am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:31pm on the 6th of NOvember 2020.
